name: SRDC
description:
This game was made by a person (me) who has only several days of Unity experience.

SRDC (abbreviation will be univeiled later) is a racing game where you need not only to make it to the finish first, but also to crash into as much destroyable objects as possible. 

As of Pre-Alpha 1.0, the game features two types of destroyable objects: road signs and fence. When you destroy them, you'll get points (they are visible on the top left part of the screen).

MAPS AVAILABLE
  • The only map is a small town made out of three-story buildings.
CARS AVAILABLE
  • Venucci (name not shown, only in game files) — orange three-door hatchback. Serves as a placeholder vehicle.
WHAT TO KNOW (as of Pre-Alpha 1.0)
  • It's not essentially a racing game for now, since there are no other racers, no checkpoints and only one test level.
  • Car controller is very bad in acceleration. It will be nice if you'll recomend me a good FREE car controller that works better than this one.
  • Sounds of collision play too many times sometimes. I don't know how to fix that.
